sub_title: VAT refund service specialist at Remobis
summary:
Performance-driven and accomplished professional with extensive experience of 15 years at international companies in product, sales, field marketing and customer service & operations. Proven record of success in devising and implementing marketing strategies to obtain organizational objectives. 5 years experience of selling Luxury goods focusing on Russian and Chinese markets.
Articulate, responsible communicator, capable of building lasting relationships with senior management,  clients, partners, and suppliers.  Focused, highly organized  leader for broad range of product, customer service and field marketing programs.
Languages: English, Russian, Lithuanian, Dutch- well,  German – understanding level.
